name: Keeper Vault - Dark Transparent
description:
Theme for making Keeper Vault (https://keepersecurity.com/vault) use the gradient theme throughout (not just the left menu panel), with dark transparencies.

Since Keeper's new UI broke the old theme, this has been a total overhaul and is still a work in progress.
additional_info:
10/14/19 - lots of fixes and tweaks (2 factor, credit card details, personal details, record fields, etc.)
7/15/19 - fixed word wrap in Notes (so it doesn't break on a word)
7/15/19 - fix left panel that turned white, tweaks to record content (removal of some new underlines, added rounded transparent black rectangles around field values), some fixes to settings overlay, etc.
5/24/19 - bunch of fixes/changes
4/18/19 - fixed login 2FA prompt
4/15/19 - background of custom field when editing made transparent
3/25/19 - Login dialog
3/22/19 - Finished theming missing parts
3/5/19 - reworked the record detail pane, other tweaks
3/4/19 - Keeper site has a new UI, which broke theme.  Started over from scratch, still work in progress.
11/27/18 - Background wallpaper doesn't work as a hosted option, code comment indicates how to add your own using base64
10/5/18 - Fixes for some font colors, Keeper logo white, login box themed
06/28/18 - fixes for menus, grid view, etc.
02/15/18 - popup for address fixed
02/13/18 - Added setting to add your own wallpaper (default blank).
11/14/17 - Keeper changed it's interface and themes a few days ago, so I had to make some changes.
